title: New: Young & Sick – Heartache Fetish
content:
One of my highlights of SXSW this year was watching multi-talented singer songwriter Young & Sick perform an acoustic set at an exclusive show in a Rainey Street penthouse.

The diversity to his sound is quite astonishing at times, and new track Heartache Fetish showcases this. Previously described as ‘future soul’, it’s immersive and hard-hitting, whilst maintaining the pop sensibilities that will no doubt open his music up to a much wider audience. Heartache Fetish is featured on his debut album, out 8 April via Harvest Records.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
